text: 27|12|(musave!) Nir umatu kaiyai umatu cattaippaikkul pukuttuviraka. Atu oru macarra venmaiyana (pirakacattutan) velivarum. (Ivvirantum) onpatu attatcikalil ullavaiyakum. (Ivarrutan) nir hpir'avnitamum avanutaiya makkalitamum celviraka. Niccayamaka avarkal pavam ceyyum makkalaka irukkinranar'' (enrum kurinom)
